audioText: La soupe préparée était trop pâle à cause du manque d'épices colorantes.
question: Why was the prepared soup too pale?
options: Because of the lack of coloring spices
Because it was prepared without proper seasoning
Because the vegetables were not fresh enough
Because the cooking time was insufficient
explanation: The text states 'La soupe préparée était trop pâle à cause du manque d'épices colorantes' - The prepared soup was too pale because of the lack of coloring spices. 'Préparée' is the feminine past participle of 'préparer' (to prepare), and 'pâle' means 'pale'.
